Package org.lwjgl.opengl

Class GLX.Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opengl.GLX.Functions
  • Enclosing class:
    GLX

    public static final class GLX.Functions
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the function pointers loaded from GL.getFunctionProvider().
